extracted-table.table-caption: Sample demographics of included dyads (N = 21) comprising of neonates and mothers that participated in this study.

caption.p: Sample demographics of included dyads (N = 21) comprising of neonates and mothers that participated in this study.

td.p: (1 = High school graduate or lower; 2 = College degree; 3 = University degree)

tr.td: Maternal use of alcohol during pregnancy (yes/no)
Frequency of maternal use of alcohol during pregnancy (More than 1–2 times a month / 1–2 times a month / less frequently)
Maternal use of illicit substances during pregnancy (yes/no)
Frequency of maternal use of illicit substances during pregnancy (More than 1–2 times a month /1–2 times a month / less frequently)

table-wrap-foot.p: Variable selection was based on previous recommendations41. Abbreviations: M = Mean; SD = Standard deviation; MAD = Mean absolute deviation; EPDS = Edinburgh postnatal depression scale 10-point questionnaire sum score filled out at 24th gestational week.
